# Performance Counters Docs

- [Performance counters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/index.md): Learn more about: WCF Performance Counters

## Endpoint Performance Counters

- [Endpoint Performance Counters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-performance-counters.md): Learn more about: Endpoint Performance Counters
- [Calls](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls
- [Calls Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Per Second
- [Calls Outstanding](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-outstanding.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Outstanding
- [Calls Failed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-failed.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Failed
- [Calls Failed Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-failed-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Failed Per Second
- [Calls Faulted](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-faulted.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Faulted
- [Calls Faulted Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-faulted-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Faulted Per Second
- [Calls Duration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-calls-duration.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Calls Duration
- [Reliable Messaging Messages Dropped](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-reliable-messaging-messages-dropped.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Reliable Messaging Messages Dropped
- [Reliable Messaging Messages Dropped Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-reliable-messaging-messages-dropped-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Reliable Messaging Messages Dropped Per Second
- [Reliable Messaging Sessions Faulted](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-reliable-messaging-sessions-faulted.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Reliable Messaging Sessions Faulted
- [Reliable Messaging Sessions Faulted Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-reliable-messaging-sessions-faulted-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Reliable Messaging Sessions Faulted Per Second
- [Security Calls Not Authorized](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-security-calls-not-authorized.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Security Calls Not Authorized
- [Security Calls Not Authorized Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-security-calls-not-authorized-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Security Calls Not Authorized Per Second
- [Security Validation and Authentication Failures](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-security-validation-and-authentication-failures.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Security Validation and Authentication Failures
- [Security Validation and Authentication Failures Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-security-validation-and-authentication-failures-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Security Validation and Authentication Failures Per Second
- [Transactions Flowed](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-transactions-flowed.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Transactions Flowed
- [Transactions Flowed Per Second](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/endpoint-transactions-flowed-per-second.md): Learn more about: Endpoint: Transactions Flowed Per Second

- [Security Validation and Authentication Failures](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/wcf/diagnostics/performance-counters/security-validation-and-authentication-failures.md): Learn more about: Security Validation and Authentication Failures
